bibl.title: The Letter of Aristeas.
bibl.note: Revised version of the English original of the article "Aristeasbrief", written for the "Reallexikon für Antike und Christentum" in 1979, and finally published in RAC. Supplementband I (1986) 573-587.
bibl.seg: Murray Oswyn, The Letter of Aristeas.
Biagio Virgilio (a cura di), Studi ellenistici. II = Biblioteca di Studi antichi. 54 (Pisa, 1987) pp. 15-29.

Revised version of the English original of the article "Aristeasbrief", written for the "Reallexikon für Antike und Christentum" in 1979, and finally published in RAC. Supplementband I (1986) 573-587.
